summary.span: Monitors two dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.

span.span: A that represents the asynchronous choice.

returns.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

span.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

returns.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

span.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

returns.span: Otherwise, the task will end with its set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.

span.span: Posts an item to the .

span.span: if the item was accepted by the target block; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette méthode retourne une fois le bloc cible a décidé d’accepter ou refuser l’élément, mais à moins que sinon dictées par une sémantique spéciale du bloc cible, il n’attend pas de l’élément à être traitée.This method will return once the target block has decided to accept or decline the item, but unless otherwise dictated by special semantics of the target block, it does not wait for the item to actually be processed. Par exemple, retournera de dès qu’il a stocké l’article publié dans sa file d’attente d’entrée).For example, will return from as soon as it has stored the posted item into its input queue). Du point de vue du traitement du bloc `Post` est asynchrone.From the perspective of the block's processing, `Post` is asynchronous. Cible bloque cette prise en charge report envoyé de messages ou, pour les blocs qui peuvent effectuer un traitement plus dans leurs `Post` mise en œuvre, envisagez d’utiliser , qui est retournée immédiatement et activera la cible reporter le message publié et le consommer ultérieurement après `SendAsync` retourne.For target blocks that support postponing offered messages, or for blocks that may do more processing in their `Post` implementation, consider using , which will return immediately and will enable the target to postpone the posted message and later consume it after `SendAsync` returns.
